testimonials.text: Fantastic developer! Has deep knowledge of react and CSS, and was able to turn around the work very very quickly. Super happy working with him, and would definitely recommend him for any frontend work. Thanks Mohamed.
Mohamed did a fantastic job. I am really pleased. He has great communication skills and it is very knowledgeable. I really enjoyed working with him.
Amazing. Super positive and easy to work with! Highly recommend!! Will hire him for more projects!
